section:
UncompressedHyperspectralImage Struct Reference UncompressedHyperspectralImage
#include <uhi_io.h>
Collaboration diagram for UncompressedHyperspectralImage:
Data Fields
file_t * fs
dim3 size
int32_t cache [UHI_CACHE_LENGTH]
Detailed Description
Stores UHI file streams.
File format designed to store 16 bit pixel data for Hyperspectral Images. The first 3 data values represent the size of the hyperspectral image, and are followed by the pixel values.
Designed to be a more RAM-friendly alternative to the image struct defined in image.h. The data is accessed from the filesystem instead of RAM, which increases latency and runtime, but reduces the RAM footprint of the overall program.
fs: file_t object for handling file IO size: stores the dimensions of the Hyperspectral image cache: Unused 32 bit static array
